description: Deployment Image Servicing and Management tool. DISM is used to enumerate, install, uninstall, configure, and update features and packages in Windows images
name: Dism Remove Online Package
query: ((process.executable:*\\DismHost.exe AND process.parent.command_line:*\/online* AND process.parent.command_line:*\/Disable\-Feature* AND process.parent.command_line:*\/FeatureName\:* AND process.parent.command_line:*\/Remove*) OR (process.executable:*\\Dism.exe AND process.command_line:*\/online* AND process.command_line:*\/Disable\-Feature* AND process.command_line:*\/FeatureName\:* AND process.command_line:*\/Remove*))
author: frack113
